name: CQ_Analytics.Slider
doc:
A helper class providing utility methods to create a jcarousel object.
See /etc/clientlibs/founda...

methods.name: getCurrentValue
methods.doc:
Method called to get the current value of the slider. Returned value must match the id.
To override.

methods.name: getIndex
methods.doc: Gets the item index of the specified dom element

methods.name: onSelect
methods.doc:
Method called when an item gets selected. To get the item, use: [data-id='" + id + "'].
To override.
